ch0243_80_yuri/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was
waiting for you!
ch0243_80_yuri/0101_0701_02_10:
I want to train with you—and spar! There are so
many things I want to do together!
ch0243_80_yuri/7101_0701_01_10:
Being trained by Master Mustard on the Isle of
Armor is one of my most treasured experiences.
ch0243_80_yuri/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s thanks to Master’s teachings and rigorous
training that I am who I am today!
ch0243_80_yuri/7102_0701_01_10:
I’m wearing my training uniform from the Isle of
Armor right now!
ch0243_80_yuri/7102_0701_02_10: It’s important to look the part, you know?
ch0243_80_yuri/7103_0701_01_10:
Water changes shape depending on what it’s
poured into...
ch0243_80_yuri/7103_0701_02_10:
Similarly, it’s important to adapt to your opponent
during battle!
ch0243_80_yuri/7103_0701_03_10: That is the essence of water!
ch0243_80_yuri/7104_0701_01_10:
My Urshifu always observes his opponents
carefully when he fights.
ch0243_80_yuri/7104_0701_02_10:
He’s as calm as the surface of a still body of
water without any ripples...
ch0243_80_yuri/7104_0701_03_10: It’s like he’s got a heart of water! Isn’t that cool?
ch0243_80_yuri/7105_0701_01_10:
No matter how difficult training can be, you can
do your best as long as someone’s there to
support you!
ch0243_80_yuri/7105_0701_02_10: That’s how I felt during my training.
ch0243_80_yuri/7105_0701_03_10:
If I run into hard times here on Pasio, I know I’ll
be OK as long as I have you by my side!
ch0243_80_yuri/1701_0701_01_10: I found this while I was on a run with Urshifu.
ch0243_80_yuri/1701_0701_02_10: You can have it, if you like!
ch0243_80_yuri/1701_0702_01_10:
You never know what you might unexpectedly
encounter besides people and Pokémon.
ch0243_80_yuri/2501_0701_01_10:
What do you think of this training uniform?
Do I look cool like Bea?
ch0243_80_yuri/2501_0701_02_10: I’ll train my hardest while wearing this...
ch0243_80_yuri/2501_0701_03_10:
in hopes that I can be just as cool as all
the other Fighting-type Pokémon Trainers
out there!
ch0243_80_yuri/2501_0702_02_10:
When Master Mustard shows his true strength
in battle, his power is incredible!
ch0243_80_yuri/2511_0701_02_10:
The most important reason to continue training isn’t
to defeat somebody.
ch0243_80_yuri/2511_0701_03_10: It’s to improve a little bit every day...
ch0243_80_yuri/2511_0701_04_10: so that we’re better than we were the day before!
ch0243_80_yuri/2511_0701_05_10: It’s a bit embarrassing saying that out loud.
ch0243_80_yuri/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ll continue to train so I can feel good
about myself!
ch0243_80_yuri/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m gonna grow stronger with Urshifu, one step at
a time! I wanna grow stronger with you, too!
ch0243_80_yuri/3001_0701_01_10:
I’ve got so much energy this morning, I feel like
I could Dynamax!
ch0243_80_yuri/3003_0701_01_10:
When I’m out running as a part of my training,
I sometimes find the most amazing places!
ch0243_80_yuri/3005_0701_01_10:
Phew! We ran around so much today that I’m
completely knackered! I should get to bed soon!
